introText.heading: xDialer A complete solutions of Call Center is an exclusive product/ software of Xubisoft Ltd. with complete functionality for inbound, outbound and blended campaigns. xDialer call center solution is built directly into their multi-channel help desk, Experience on the fly integrations with Agent toolbars & pre-built connectors for leading third-party CRM.The all-inclusive solutions for contact centers are ideal for different business processes such as Customer support, Telemarketing and Sales, Collections, Technical support, Marketing research and Helpdesk.

faq.title: Make and Receive Calls
faq.desc: Call Control, Call Transfer When Not Online, Call Forward on No Answer, Call Routing and Queuing, Call Forward on Busy, Call Detail Records Call Logs, Caller ID, Unlimited Concurrent Calls, Personalized Greetings, Business Hours, Agent To Agent Calling

faq.title: Monitoring and Reporting
faq.desc: Call Monitoring, Call Barging, Historical Reporting, Agent Reporting, Custom Reporting, Prebuilt Reports
